org.dejava.component.ejb.component

Interface GenericComponent<Entity,Key>

  • Type Parameters:
    Entity - Any entity.
    Key - Key of the entity.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGenericComponent

    public interface GenericComponent<Entity,Key>
    Defines the expected interface of a entity component.

        Gets all entities with the given attribute value.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - The attribute name.
        attributeValue - The attribute value.
        firstResult - The first result that should be considered by the query.
        maxResults - The maximum numbers of results to be considered by the query.
        Returns:
        All entities with the given attribute value.
